Rules Whether Leave encashment allowed by Encashment of Earned Leave allowed by the Govt. under CCS (Leave) Rules, 1972 on Govt. under the CCS (Leave) Rules, 1972 for absorption in central autonomous service rendered in the Central Govt, prior to body/PSU is to be taken into account? absorption in Central Autonomous Body shall not be taken into account while calculating the number of days Earned Leave enchashable in an autonomous bodyl PSU for the post absorption period B Both Earned Leave and Half Leave shall be considered for encashment of leave subject to overall limit of 300 days, in accordance with the provisions contained in DoP&t OM No.14028/3/2008-Estt (L) dated 25.9.2008, as amended from time to time. 2 The provisions of this Policy Circular shall come into effect from the date of issue of respective OMs of the DoP&t 3_ This issues with approval of the Chairman, NHAI. 13 (V.K.
